titles.title: To designate the visitors center at Warm Springs Dam, California, as the "Milt Brandt Visitors Center".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 3/8/1994--Introduced. Designates the visitors center at the Warms Springs Dam component of the project for flood control, Russian River, Dry Creek, California, as the Milt Brandt Visitors Center.
